member.name: BaseValueSource
member.summary: Defines constants that specify where the effective value of a property was set.

member.name: BaseValueSource.BaseValueSourceUnknown
member.summary: The source of the property value is not known.

member.name: BaseValueSource.BaseValueSourceDefault
member.summary: The value has not been set locally or by any styles, so it has the default value defined in generic.xaml.

member.name: BaseValueSource.BaseValueSourceBuiltInStyle
member.summary: The value was set by a built-in style.

member.name: BaseValueSource.BaseValueSourceStyle
member.summary: The value was set by a style.

member.name: BaseValueSource.Inherited
member.summary: The value was inherited from a parent element.

member.name: BaseValueSource.DefaultStyleTrigger
member.summary: The value was set by a default style trigger.

member.name: BaseValueSource.TemplateTrigger
member.summary: The value was set by a template style.

member.name: BaseValueSource.StyleTrigger
member.summary: The value was set by a style trigger.

member.name: BaseValueSource.ImplicitStyleReference
member.summary: The value was set by an implicit style reference.

member.name: BaseValueSource.ParentTemplate
member.summary: The value was set by a parent template.

member.name: BaseValueSource.ParentTemplateTrigger
member.summary: The value was set by a parent template trigger.

member.name: BaseValueSource.Animation
member.summary: The value was set by an animation.

member.name: BaseValueSource.Coercion
member.summary: The value was coerced in code.

member.name: BaseValueSource.BaseValueSourceVisualState
member.summary: The value was set by a visual state. (Introduced in Windows 10, version 1607.)
